name: Popularity Stats for WordPress
author: Hors Hipsrectors

sections.description:
** this plugin is no longer being update. Please feel free to adopt me! **

The Popularity Stats plugin is a handy plugin for WordPress which quickly reports the popularity of a website by checking with a number of website sources. The Popularity Stats tool includes details about a websites:

  • Google PageRank
  • Alexa Rank
  • Inbound Links

The information is displayed in the WP Admin area of the website and also includes the ability to display the data as a badge for web users to see.
sections.installation: To install the plugin, please upload the folder to your plugins folder and active the plugin.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

To install the plugin, please upload the folder to your plugins folder and active the plugin.

Is this plugin stable?

Technically yes. Until I upgrade the version to 1.x, I still consider it to be in development but yes it has been tested and works well.

0.0.4 – fixed pulldown menu in plugin settings

0.0.6 – fixed graph for Alexa, set default values
0.0.7 – added instruction link
